items.title: Annie, Fiery
items.altText: Riftbound. Annie, Fiery. Rarity: Epic. Color: Red. Type: Unit. Super: Champion. Tags: Annie. How to play this card: Your spells and abilities deal 1 Bonus Damage. Each instance of damage the spell deals is increased by 1.

items.title: Firestorm
items.altText: Riftbound. Firestorm. Rarity: Uncommon. Color: Red. Type: Spell. Super: None. Tags: None. How to play this card: Deal 3 to all enemy units at a battlefield.

items.title: Incinerate
items.altText: Riftbound. Incinerate. Rarity: Common. Color: Red. Type: Spell. Super: None. Tags: None. How to play this card: Action Play on your turn or in showdowns. Deal 2 to a unit at a battlefield.

items.title: Yi, Meditative
items.altText: Riftbound. Yi, Meditative. Rarity: Rare. Color: Green. Type: Unit. Super: Champion. Tags: Master Yi. How to play this card: While you have 8+ runes, I have +4 S.

items.title: Zephyr Sage
items.altText: Riftbound. Zephyr Sage. Rarity: Uncommon. Color: Green. Type: Unit. Super: None. Tags: Bird. How to play this card: Shield +1 S while I'm a defender.

items.title: Lux, Illuminated
items.altText: Riftbound. Lux, Illuminated. Rarity: Rare. Color: Blue. Type: Unit. Super: Champion. Tags: Lux. How to play this card: When you play a spell that costs 5 or more, give me +3 S this turn.

items.title: Garen, Rugged
items.altText: Riftbound. Garen, Rugged. Rarity: Rare. Color: Orange. Type: Unit. Super: Champion. Tags: Garen,Elite. How to play this card: Assault 2, Shield 2 +2 S while I'm an attacker or defender.

items.title: Gentlemen's Duel
items.altText: Riftbound. Gentlemen's Duel. Rarity: Common. Color: Orange. Type: Spell. Super: None. Tags: None. How to play this card: Action Play on your turn or in showdowns. Give a friendly unit +3 S this turn. Then choose an enemy unit. They deal damage equal to their Mights to each other.

items.title: Yi, Honed
items.altText: Riftbound. Yi, Honed. Rarity: Epic. Color: Orange. Type: Unit. Super: Champion. Tags: Master Yi. How to play this card: Ganking I can move from battlefield to battlefield. I enter ready.

items.title: Annie, Stubborn
items.altText: Riftbound. Annie, Stubborn. Rarity: Rare. Color: Purple. Type: Unit. Super: Champion. Tags: Annie. How to play this card: When you play me, return a spell from your trash to your hand.

items.title: Flash
items.altText: Riftbound. Flash. Rarity: Common. Color: Purple. Type: Spell. Super: None. Tags: None. How to play this card: Reaction Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve. Move up to 2 friendly units to base.

items.title: Blast of Power
items.altText: Riftbound. Blast of Power. Rarity: Common. Color: Yellow. Type: Spell. Super: None. Tags: None. How to play this card: Action Play on your turn or in showdowns. Kill a unit at a battlefield.

items.title: Garen, Commander
items.altText: Riftbound. Garen, Commander. Rarity: Epic. Color: Yellow. Type: Unit. Super: Champion. Tags: Garen,Elite. How to play this card: Other friendly units have +1 S here.

items.title: Lux, Crownguard
items.altText: Riftbound. Lux, Crownguard. Rarity: Epic. Color: Yellow. Type: Unit. Super: Champion. Tags: Lux. How to play this card: T: Reaction: Add 2. Use only to play spells. Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.

items.title: Recruit the Vanguard
items.altText:
Riftbound. Recruit the Vanguard. Rarity: Uncommon. Color: Yellow. Type: Spell. Super: None. Tags: None. How to play this card: Action Play on your turn or in showdowns.
 Play four 1 S Recruit unit tokens. They can be played to your base or to battlefields you control.

items.title: Vanguard Attendant
items.altText: Riftbound. Vanguard Attendant. Rarity: Common. Color: Yellow. Type: Unit. Super: None. Tags: Elite. How to play this card: I enter ready.

items.title: Dark Child - Starter
items.altText: Riftbound. Dark Child - Starter. Rarity: Rare. Color: Red,Purple. Type: Legend. Super: Champion. Tags: Annie. How to play this card: At the end of your turn, ready 2 runes.

items.title: Tibbers
items.altText: Riftbound. Tibbers. Rarity: Epic. Color: Red,Purple. Type: Unit. Super: Signature. Tags: Annie. How to play this card: When you play me, deal 3 to all units at battlefields.

items.title: Wuju Bladesman - Starter
items.altText: Riftbound. Wuju Bladesman - Starter. Rarity: Rare. Color: Green,Orange. Type: Legend. Super: Champion. Tags: Master Yi. How to play this card: While a friendly unit defends alone, it gets +2 S.

items.title: Highlander
items.altText:
Riftbound. Highlander. Rarity: Epic. Color: Green, Orange. Type: Spell. Super: Signature. Tags: Master Yi. How to play this card: Reaction Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.
 Choose a friendly unit. The next time it dies this turn, recall it exhausted instead. Send it to base. This isn't a move.

items.title: Lady of Luminosity - Starter
items.altText: Riftbound. Lady of Luminosity - Starter. Rarity: Rare. Color: Blue,Yellow. Type: Legend. Super: Champion. Tags: Lux. How to play this card: When you play a spell that costs 5 or more, draw 1.

items.title: Final Spark
items.altText: Riftbound. Final Spark. Rarity: Epic. Color: Blue,Yellow. Type: Spell. Super: Signature. Tags: Lux. How to play this card: Action Play on your turn or in showdowns. Deal 8 to a unit.

items.title: Might of Demacia - Starter
items.altText: Riftbound. Might of Demacia - Starter. Rarity: Rare. Color: Orange,Yellow. Type: Legend. Super: Champion. Tags: Garen. How to play this card: When you conquer, if you have 4+ units at that battlefield, draw 2.

items.title: Decisive Strike
items.altText: Riftbound. Decisive Strike. Rarity: Epic. Color: Orange,Yellow. Type: Spell. Super: Signature. Tags: Garen. How to play this card: Action Play on your turn or in showdowns. Give friendly units +2 S this turn.
